reviews.text: We recently completed a patio project consisting of a roof, outdoor kitchen and Carvestone floor. Our experience with Allied was fantastic start to finish. Our designer guided us to great decisions and kept us from going overboard, the project management team always kept updated and kept the work moving, each trade and the workers who did the work were experts in their field and very professional. The customer service was great and they responded quickly to any questions or issues we had. We wou

I would like to take a minute to comment on the job that allied did on our backyard. We moved into a new house and needed a complete makeover of the backyard. Allied's people were very professional, on time, and diligent about the work that they did. Everything turned out great. They are a wonderful contractor to work with.

After several estimates we decided to go with Allied Outdoor Solutions (AOS). While not the lowest of the estimates, they were not the highest. Our concern was a reputable company that will deliver what was promised with the least amount of hiccups. AOS definitely delivered as they promised and the extended patio build was exactly as expected. Communication was exceptional with little to no lapse between responses. I can't think of anything to recommend for improvement. Keep up the good work!

We researched many contractors and kept coming back to the quality of construction we saw in the online photos from Allied.  Our first introduction to Vince Corcoran, our sales rep was excellent, answering all our questions, walking through how they approach a project like our outdoor patio, and how the process would go. In addition, as we made changes along the way, the pricing was very quick and we were able to evaluate what we wanted to do. The meetings with the Construction Supervisor, Colli

Allied Outdoor Solutions is absolutely the place to go for a professional, detail oriented and handcrafted masterpiece. Of course no outdoor project goes perfectly, because there are so many moving parts but they came through any time there was any sort of hiccup. Their time in the business shows in their finished product and was exactly what was promised. Would recommend to anyone looking for a professional and beautiful project!

UPDATE
Allied told us they would repair the cracked carvestone IF we took down our review. After we said no and reminded them that this violates the Consumer Review Fairness Act, they offered to make repairs. The repairs did nothing. We still have many cracks (even a 20ft crack going straight down our patio. They say it is due to ground movement, but the cracks happened weeks after their install. Don’t waste your money. We are so disappointed and feel completely scammed.

Working with Allied Outdoor Solutions was so easy and our project vision came to life. Jay was so nice and helpful in the planning process. The crew was professional and everything was done in precise detail.  It was exactly what we hoped for.

Allied Outdoor Solutions exceeded expectations in the recent redesign of our backyard.  The team flawlessly executed our vision, maintaining consistent communication throughout the design and construction phases via a dedicated  application.  Project Manager Collins' proactive updates and insightful feedback were invaluable.  We highly recommend Allied Outdoor any home renovation project.

Don’t pay the hefty price tag thinking you will be taken care of or happy. Concrete work done on our project was poorly done. Cracks in sealant, chunks of concrete falling off of edges. Seal is haphazard and splotchy. Crews out to correct it multiple times, only to be incorrectly corrected. Was told it was way below their standards but still charged the ENTIRE amount and they appreciate our patience. Tens of thousands for below standard concrete. Mastic was corrected with paint after weeks of be

Personally I dislike being overwhelmed by Contractor bids; however, I understand the benefits of the process.  If I hadn’t I would not have discovered Allied Outdoor Solutions (AOS).  They weren’t the cheapest nor the most expensive but their professionalism and efficiency are second to none.  Working with Alex, Jay & Robin has been refreshing.  They care that you’re absolutely satisfied with your project, at each phase, and that’s important to me.  Best of all, the finished product speaks for i

Felipe and Kyle did an awesome job communicating throughout the project.
Fidel and his crew showed up on-time and completed the project in a timely manner.
The completed project looks great!

Allied Outdoor Solutions did an amazing job with my backyard patio renovation. They are true consummate professionals, from the initial design phase to the actual construction where it's clear they take pride in their work. Once the project began, it only took 2 days (plus 1 extra day for the concrete to harden / dry) to complete. I would definitely recommend them to any of my neighbors who needed work done in their backyard! Alex and Kyle were awesome and so was the construction crew!

Our pool deck was transformed by Allied with their Carve stone. Their workmen were very professional and experts at what they did. They had to delay due to weather but were very communicative as to when they would be on site. Once started, they were very quick and did outstanding. I would highly recommend to anyone getting their outdoor spaces updated,

We just had Carvestone added to our patio, and it brought the space to life. Everyone was professional, punctual, and the quality of work was top-tier. From Jared showcasing Allied’s options, to Felipe managing the project, to Caesar who did the installation — I am more than satisfied and would gladly recommend Allied Outdoor Solutions.

After extensively researching outdoor contractors to build out new living spaces in our backyard for relaxing and entertaining, I knew that Allied Outdoor Solutions was the right choice. This group is totally focused on making your vision a reality. The entire process, from start to finish, was unbelievably smooth.
Alex designed our outdoor living spaces, and he “blew my mind away” when he got every detail of what we wanted in the design. His aesthetics are impeccable!

We highly recommend Allied for outdoor projects. We had no idea if our backyard was fixable, ever since we moved in, it’s just been a muddy unusable space. I saw Allied on IG and took a leap to try to start this outdoor project. From Damion, who guided us through our wish list, and let us know what honestly was possible. He also made sure that it stayed within our budget, never tried to upsell us or pressure to go outside of our budget. To Jay & Kyle who ensured that the project was done right,

Allied Outdoor Solutions did an outstanding job from start to finish! Their quality of work is excellent, and their communication throughout the process was top-notch. They truly are perfectionists—when a section of concrete was poured with a level spot that could have caused drainage issues, their own team caught it, removed the concrete, and re-poured it correctly without me even noticing the issue. That level of attention to detail is rare and so appreciated!

Adam was fantastic—always kind,
From beginning to end, they are an easy company to deal with, and they did excellent work on our pool remodel - Thanks to Keith, Robyn, Chad & the rest of the team!

Allied Patio is an outstanding company! We had our patio covered using the hip roof style with vaulted ceiling. Their crews cleaned up after each day and were very helpful and knowledgeable. We would definitely recommend them! Also the staff kept us informed and we always knew what works happen that day or others. Great process and looks lovely.

The Allied crew did an awesome job!

Sean, Felipe, Kyle and Vicente did an exceptional job in coordinating, communicating and installation. My project was a small one (back patio concrete pour) but they treated us as if we were a client with a large project.

Their attention to detail and delivery shows that no project is too small  for them to handle.
